title: MainStage Irving-Las Colinas presents The Addams Family (Greater Irving Las Colinas Chamber of Commerce)
text: ( Source : Greater Irving Las Colinas Chamber of Commerce ) Presented by MainStage Irving-Las Colinas MainStage Irving-Las Colinas opens its 2015-16 Light the Lights ! season with the new musical comedy, THE ADDAMS FAMILY (book by Marshall
